description: Catches and handles exceptions of a specific type within a Try Catch activity

argumentStructure.description: DelegateInArgument that receives the caught exception

activityActionStructure.handlerDescription: The activity to execute when the exception is caught

notes: TypeArguments must match between Catch and ActivityAction. Common types: s:Exception, System.BusinessRuleException, System.ApplicationException. The activityAction must contain an argument (DelegateInArgument) and a handler (non-null activity).
